thread.title: Work With Special-Needs Families Underscores the Value of Planning

author: wsjcom
title: Work With Special-Needs Families Underscores the Value of Planning
text:
Charles Massimo is chief executive of CJM Wealth Management in Deer Park, N.Y. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. As told to Alex Coppola.
As the father of two boys with autism, helping special-needs families manage their financial planning isn’t simply a professional challenge—it’s one that I’m living myself. That understanding has allowed me to not only identify with clients in these situations, but also provide them with guidance...
